General.Name: King’s Town Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: King's Town Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the residential and building development in Taiwan. The company develops, constructs, rents, and sells specific professional areas. It also engages in the hotel and restaurant businesses; and provision of zoning and rezoning agency business. The company was formerly known as Wei Cheng Construction Co., Ltd. King's Town Construction Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
